catalog_info.title: Behavioral Biology Seminar
catalog_info.notes:
Required of entering graduate students in Human Evolutionary Biology seeking to fulfill a course requirement in the subject areas of behavior and ecology of humans or behavior and ecology of primates.
Open to other Human Evolutionary Biology graduate students.
Limited to Human Evolutionary Biology graduate students.
catalog_info.prereq: Course open to Graduate Students Only
catalog_info.description: Reading and discussion of current research in the behavioral ecology of humans and nonhuman primates. Emphasis placed on comparative and interdisciplinary approaches.
